name: Be lakor the Dark Master
flavorText: A winged nightmare wreathed in darkness and redolent with terrible power, Be’lakor strides forth to subjugate the Mortal Realms and bring them under his tyrannical rule. With shadow magic and daemonic might he obliterates his foes, revelling in their agonised death throes.
description: Be’lakor, the Dark Master, is a named character that is a single model. Be’lakor is armed with the Blade of Shadows, a Fell Claw and a Spearing Tail.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This model can fly.

abilities.name: The Dark Master
abilities.flavorText: Many puppets dance on Be’lakor’s infernal strings, though few realise as much until their fate is sealed.
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of the enemy hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit on the battlefield. Until your next hero phase, at the start of each phase (including the phase in which the unit was picked), you can roll a dice for that unit. On a 3+, that unit cannot move, shoot, fight, use command abilities, chant prayers, attempt to cast spells, attempt to dispel endless spells or attempt to unbind spells in that phase.

abilities.name: Lord of Torment
abilities.flavorText: Be’lakor is invigorated by the suffering and terror of mortals.
abilities.description: If an enemy unit fails a battleshock test while it is within 12" of this model, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.

abilities.name: Shadow Form
abilities.flavorText: Be’lakor’s can shift his physical form to be as insubstantial as the mists of Ulgu, and just as hard to land a telling blow upon.
abilities.description: Ignore modifiers (positive or negative) when making save rolls for attacks that target this model.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldEnfeeble Foe
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 2 spells in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 2 spells in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Enfeeble Foe spells.

abilities.name: Enfeeble Foe
abilities.flavorText: With a series of hissed incantations, Be’lakor instils visions of loss and despair in the minds of his enemies to drain them of their fighting spirit.
abilities.description: Enfeeble Foe has a casting value of 6. If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them. Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by that unit until your next hero phase.

name: Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage
flavorText: A Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage is a force of supreme carnage upon the battlefield, charging forwards with horrific momentum to shatter entire formations with the force of its impact before carving a ruinous path through the survivors.
description: A Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage is a single model armed with a Great Axe of Khorne.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This model can fly.

abilities.name: Outrageous Carnage
abilities.flavorText: The Great Axe of Khorne strikes with the boundless rage of the Blood God himself.
abilities.description: If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made by this model is 6, each enemy unit within 8" of this model suffers the number of mortal wounds shown on the damage table above, in addition to any normal damage.

abilities.name: Rage Unbound
abilities.flavorText: Corpses fly as this enraged daemon collides with the enemy.
abilities.description: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by this model if it made a charge move in the same turn.

abilities.name: Bloodthirsty Charge
abilities.flavorText: The land quakes as this mighty Bloodthirster leads its daemon kin into the inferno of battle.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability at the start of your charge phase. If you do so, pick a friendly model with this command ability. Until the end of that phase, you can re-roll charge rolls for friendly KHORNE DAEMON units wholly within 16" of that model when the charge roll is made.

name: Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury
flavorText: As the Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury stalks forwards, its whip lashing out to strip flesh from bone, the very earth bleeds beneath its smouldering hooves, causing gouts of molten rock to incinerate all who dare to oppose the unholy terror before them.
description: A Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury is a single model armed with a Lash of Khorne and a Mighty Axe of Khorne.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This model can fly.

abilities.name: Drawn in for the Kill
abilities.flavorText: Those not immediately slain by the lacerations inflicted by a Bloodthirster’s whip may find themselves ensnared by its cruel barbs, rendering escape impossible.
abilities.description: At the start of the enemy movement phase, pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of this model. That unit cannot retreat in that phase.

abilities.name: The Land Rebels
abilities.flavorText: The ground around a Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury becomes cracked and broken beneath its stomping hooves, causing molten rock to bubble up from deep below.
abilities.description: At the start of your hero phase, roll 1 dice for each enemy unit wholly within 8" of any units with this ability. On a 5+ that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Rejoice in the Slaughter
abilities.flavorText: A Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury is an unsubtle leader, driving its subjects into the enemy in great numbers.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick a friendly model with this command ability. Until the end of that combat phase friendly KHORNE DAEMON units wholly within 16" of that model are eligible to fight in that combat phase if they are within 6" of an enemy unit instead of 3", and can move an extra 3" when they pile in.

name: Great Unclean One
flavorText: The Great Unclean Ones are immensely resilient and frighteningly strong. Able to barge down fortress gates and crush monstrous beasts with their sheer bulk, these greater daemons are infernal icons of Nurgle’s malign power.

name: Kairos Fateweaver
flavorText: Kairos Fateweaver can see the past and the future, and he uses this ability to twist destiny to suit his own malevolent purposes. The twin-headed terror is a master of magic known as the Oracle of Tzeentch – wherever he goes, change is sure to follow.
description: Kairos Fateweaver is a named character that is a single model. He is armed with the Staff of Tomorrow and his Beaks and Claws.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This model can fly.

abilities.name: Mastery of Magic
abilities.flavorText: To master the arcane is to embody the grand design of the Changer of the Ways.
abilities.description: When this model makes a casting, unbinding or dispelling roll, you can change the lowest D6 to match the highest D6.

abilities.name: Spell-eater
abilities.flavorText: Tzeentch’s daemons revel in the Arcanum Optimar, summoning and dispelling even the most predatory spells at will.
abilities.description: Once per turn, in your hero phase, you can pick 1 endless spell within 18" of this model. That endless spell is dispelled.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldGift of Change
abilities.description: Kairos Fateweaver is a WIZARD. He can attempt to cast 3 spells in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 3 spells in the enemy hero phase. He knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Gift of Change spells. In addition, while friendly WIZARDS are wholly within 18" of him, Kairos Fateweaver knows any spells on those WIZARDS’ warscrolls that are possible for him to cast.

abilities.name: Gift of Change
abilities.flavorText: As Kairos traces a burning sigil in the air, he gifts his foes the boon of mutating flesh.
abilities.description: Gift of Change has a casting value of 8. If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them. That unit suffers a number of mortal wounds equal to the Gift of Change value shown on the caster’s damage table. If any models were slain by this spell, before removing the first slain model, you can add a TZEENTCH CHAOS SPAWN to your army and set it up within 3" of the slain model’s unit.

name: Keeper of Secrets
flavorText: A Keeper of Secrets is a greater daemon of Slaanesh, a consummate warrior and spellmaster of the Dark Prince’s hosts. Its four powerful arms move languidly as it slinks forwards, only to explode into lethal motion when their prey is in reach.
description: A Keeper of Secrets is a single model armed with an Elegant Greatblade, Impaling Claws and one of the following weapon options: Ritual Knife; Sinistrous Hand; Living Whip; or Shining Aegis.

abilities.name: Dark Temptations
abilities.flavorText: Few can resist the temptations whispered by a Keeper of Secrets.
abilities.description: At the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy HERO within 3" of this model. If you do so, your opponent must choose whether that HERO accepts or refuses temptation. If it refuses, that HERO suffers D3 mortal wounds. If it accepts, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that HERO. Then, at the start of the next combat phase, roll a dice. On 1-3, that HERO no longer receives this modifier to its hit rolls. On 4-6, that HERO is slain.

abilities.name: Delicate Precision
abilities.flavorText: A Keeper of Secrets attacks its foes with a dazzling array of exquisitely measured blows.
abilities.description: If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a missile or melee weapon by this model is 6, that attack inflicts a number of mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic of the weapon used for the attack and the attack sequence ends (do not make a save roll).

abilities.name: Living Whip
abilities.flavorText: A living whip can be used to entangle the weapons of a larger opponent.
abilities.description: If this model is armed with a Living Whip, at the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy MONSTER model within 6" of this model and roll a dice. On a 3+, pick 1 melee weapon that model is armed with. Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with that weapon until the end of that phase.

abilities.name: Ritual Knife
abilities.flavorText: The Keeper of Secrets despatches a badly wounded victim with a final dagger-thrust.
abilities.description: If this model is armed with a Ritual Knife, at the end of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy model within 1" of this model that has any wounds allocated to it and roll a dice. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2-5, that model suffers 1 mortal wound. On a 6, that model suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Shining Aegis
abilities.flavorText: This masterfully created shield can turn aside blows and magical spells.
abilities.description: If this model is armed with a Shining Aegis, roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model. On a 6+, that wound or mortal wound is negated.

abilities.name: Sinistrous Hand
abilities.flavorText: Reaching out with bladed talons, the Keeper of Secrets rips the heart from its dying victim’s chest and consumes the still-beating organ.
abilities.description: If this model is armed with a Sinistrous Hand, at the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model. If any enemy HEROES were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that phase, you can heal up to D6 wounds allocated to this model instead.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldCacophonic Choir
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 2 spells in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 2 spells in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Cacophonic Choir spells.

abilities.name: Cacophonic Choir
abilities.flavorText: The Keeper of Secrets unleashes a sanity-shattering chorus of magical sound.
abilities.description: Cacophonic Choir has a casting value of 6. If successfully cast, roll 2D6. Each enemy unit within 6" of the caster that has a Bravery characteristic of less than the roll suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Excess of Violence
abilities.flavorText: With the subtlest of gestures, a Keeper of Secrets can order its followers to attack with redoubled aggression.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability in the combat phase when it is your turn to pick a unit to fight with. If you do so, pick 1 other friendly HEDONITE unit that has already fought once in that phase and is wholly within 12" of a model with this command ability. That unit can be picked to fight for a second time if it is within 3" of any enemy units. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once in the same phase.

name: Lord of Change
flavorText: The greatest of Tzeentch’s daemons, the Lords of Change shimmer with raw magic. With a flick of their claw, they can hurl foes into the nightmarish Realm of Chaos, blast enemies with wyrdfire or steal opponents’ spells for their own use.
description: A Lord of Change is a single model armed with one of the following weapon options: Staff of Tzeentch and Baleful Sword; Staff of Tzeentch and Rod of Sorcery; or Staff of Tzeentch and Curved Beak and Wicked Talons.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This model can fly.

abilities.name: Mastery of Magic
abilities.flavorText: To master the arcane is to embody the grand design of the Changer of the Ways.
abilities.description: When this model makes a casting, unbinding or dispelling roll, you can change the lowest D6 to match the highest D6.

abilities.name: Spell-eater
abilities.flavorText: Tzeentch’s daemons revel in the Arcanum Optimar, summoning and dispelling even the most predatory spells at will.
abilities.description: Once per turn, in your hero phase, you can pick 1 endless spell within 18" of this model. That endless spell is dispelled.

abilities.name: Spell-thief
abilities.flavorText: Should a rival sorcerer conjure a spell that intrigues the Lord of Change, the greater daemon will acquire the incantation for its own use.
abilities.description: If this model successfully unbinds an enemy spell with an unbinding roll of 9+, this model can attempt to cast that spell, if it is possible for it to do so, for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldInfernal Gateway
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 2 spells in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 2 spells in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Infernal Gateway spells.

abilities.name: Infernal Gateway
abilities.flavorText: The Lord of Change opens a portal to the Realm of Chaos, pulling enemies to their doom.
abilities.description: Infernal Gateway has a casting value of 7. If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them and roll 9 dice. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound for each roll that is equal to or greater than the Infernal Gateway value shown on the caster’s damage table.

abilities.name: Beacon of Sorcery
abilities.flavorText: Spreading its arms wide, the Lord of Change saturates the area with raw magic.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability at the start of your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly model with this command ability. Until your next hero phase, you can add 1 to casting and unbinding rolls for friendly TZEENTCH DAEMON WIZARDS while they are wholly within 18" of that model. The same unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per turn.

name: Rotigus
flavorText: Brandishing his mouldy gnarlrod at the skies, Rotigus Rainfather calls down the inundating Deluge of Nurgle, even as the fanged maws that split his flesh vomit streams of diseased bile, drowning the enemy in torrents of noxious filth.

name: Shalaxi Helbane
flavorText: Known as the Monarch of the Hunt, Shalaxi Helbane is Slaanesh’s weapon against the daemons of the other Chaos Gods. Able to discern the secrets of the Dark Prince’s foes through blended senses, this statuesque warrior has slain a thousand rivals and more.
description: Shalaxi Helbane is a named character that is a single model. They are armed with Soulpiercer, Impaling Claws and one of the following weapon options: Living Whip; or Shining Aegis.

abilities.name: Cloak of Constriction
abilities.flavorText: Any opponent that draws too close to Shalaxi Helbane finds themselves ensnared by the tentacular pseudopods of the daemon’s cloak.
abilities.description: Add 1 to save rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by HEROES that target this model.

abilities.name: Delicate Precision
abilities.flavorText: A Keeper of Secrets attacks its foes with a dazzling array of exquisitely measured blows.
abilities.description: If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a missile or melee weapon by this model is 6, that attack inflicts a number of mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic of the weapon used for the attack and the attack sequence ends (do not make a save roll).

abilities.name: Irresistible Challenge
abilities.flavorText: Few can resist the sorcerous challenge delivered by Shalaxi Helbane – those who do find their cowardice rewarded with crippling agony.
abilities.description: At the start of the enemy charge phase, you can pick 1 enemy HERO within 12" of this model and more than 3" from any friendly models. If you do so, your opponent must choose whether that HERO accepts or refuses Shalaxi’s challenge. If it refuses, that HERO suffers D3 mortal wounds. If it accepts, that HERO must attempt to charge, and must finish the charge move within ½" of this model if it is possible for it to do so. In addition, if it accepts the challenge, any attacks that HERO makes in the following combat phase must target this model.

abilities.name: Living Whip
abilities.flavorText: A living whip can be used to entangle the weapons of a larger opponent.
abilities.description: If this model is armed with a Living Whip, at the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy MONSTER model within 6" of this model and roll a dice. On a 3+, pick 1 melee weapon that model is armed with. Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with that weapon until the end of that phase.

abilities.name: Shining Aegis
abilities.flavorText: This masterfully created shield can turn aside blows and magical spells.
abilities.description: If this model is armed with a Shining Aegis, roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model. On a 6+, that wound or mortal wound is negated.

abilities.name: The Killing Stroke
abilities.flavorText: Shalaxi Helbane can outwit any foe, delivering a subtle series of attacks and feints that sets them up for a final killing blow.
abilities.description: At the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy HERO within 3" of this model. If you do so, all attacks made by this model in that phase must target that model, but the Damage characteristic of this model’s Soulpiercer is 6 instead of D6 until the end of that phase.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldRefine Senses
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 2 spells in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 2 spells in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Refine Senses spells.

abilities.name: Refine Senses
abilities.flavorText: The sorcerer channels magical power into their senses, so that nothing can be hidden from them and none can escape their wrath.
abilities.description: Refine Senses is a spell that has a casting value of 4. If successfully cast, until your next hero phase, you can add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by the caster that target a HERO, and you can add 1 to save rolls for attacks made by HEROES that target the caster.

name: Skarbrand
flavorText: A daemonic engine of destruction like no other, Skarbrand carves a red road of ruin across the battlefield. His bellowing roars cause the blood to boil in his enemies’ veins, and his twin axes create a rain of gore with every almighty swing.
description: Skarbrand is a named character that is a single model. He is armed with Slaughter, Carnage and a Roar of Total Rage.

abilities.name: Roar of Total Rage
abilities.flavorText: When Skarbrand roars, his anger breaks the bounds of reason, causing the blood of those near him to boil in their veins, or their heads to explode with apocalyptic fury.
abilities.description: Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with the Roar of Total Rage. Instead, pick 1 enemy unit that is in range of the attack and roll the number of dice shown on the damage table above. For each 4+ that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Skarbrand’s Rage
abilities.flavorText: Skarbrand’s infamous fury cannot be quenched. Attacking him only serves to stoke his anger, and his wrath rises to an inferno whenever violence is denied to him.
abilities.description: From the second battle round, if this model is on the battlefield and did not attack in at least one of the combat phases of the previous battle round, when you look up a value on this model’s damage table the model is treated as having suffered 13 wounds.

abilities.name: Total Carnage
abilities.flavorText: The axe Carnage contains the trapped soul of a mighty Bloodthirster slain by Skarbrand, which exacts its catastrophic revenge on the weapon’s least fortunate victims.
abilities.description: Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with Carnage. Instead, roll a dice. The target unit suffers 8 mortal wounds if the roll is equal to or greater than the Carnage value shown on the damage table above. If the roll is 6, the target unit suffers 16 mortal wounds instead.

abilities.name: Inescapable Wrath
abilities.flavorText: Though Skarbrand’s wings are now torn and ragged, little is safe from his rampages.
abilities.description: You can re-roll charge rolls for this model.

name: Syll Esske the Vengeful Allegiance
flavorText: Syll Lewdtongue has inspired thousands of warlords to acts of tyranny and misrule, but since uniting their powers with the megalomaniacal daemon-monarch Esske, the Herald of Slaanesh has become a force of conquest like no other.
description: Syll’Esske, the Vengeful Allegiance is a named character that is a single model. Syll is armed with a Scourging Whip.

characteristics.name: COMPANION
characteristics.description: Esske attacks with the Axe of Dominion. For rules purposes, Esske is treated in the same manner as a mount.

abilities.name: Deadly Symbiosis
abilities.flavorText: The hosts of Syll’Esske comprise outcast mortals and daemons who yearn for the power they believe is rightfully theirs. In battle they seek to emulate the symbiosis of their master, compelling one another to escalating acts of depraved violence.
abilities.description: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly HEDONITE units wholly within 18" of this model if the number of friendly MORTAL HEDONITE units wholly within 18" of this model is equal to the number of other friendly DAEMON HEDONITE units wholly within 18" of this model.

abilities.name: Lithe and Swift
abilities.flavorText: Spurring one another on, Syll and their consort stride across the battlefield with uncanny swiftness.
abilities.description: This unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.

abilities.name: The Vengeful Allegiance
abilities.flavorText: The twin halves of the Vengeful Allegiance fight with a deadly unity; no sooner has a foe blocked one attack than another comes cleaving into their flank. This unique style of combat is incredibly deadly, and can make even the smallest mistake a fatal one.
abilities.description: In the combat phase, if the unmodified hit roll for any attack made with a melee weapon that targets this model is 1, add 1 to hit and wound rolls for attacks made by this model that target the attacking unit in the same phase.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldSubvert
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Subvert spells.

abilities.name: Subvert
abilities.flavorText: Syll torments the foe with whispers and visions, distracting them from their duties.
abilities.description: Subvert has a casting value of 7. If successfully cast, you can pick 1 enemy HERO within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Until your next hero phase, that HERO cannot issue or receive commands.

abilities.name: Regal Authority
abilities.flavorText: Syll’s consort is revered as a mighty ruler by their followers.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase if this model is your general and is on the battlefield. If you do so, until the end of that phase, do not take battleshock tests for friendly SLAANESH units while they are wholly within 18" of this model.

name: Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster
flavorText: Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirsters are the Lord of Battle’s agents of vengeance, sent to claim the skulls of those who have offended him. With hellforged weapons and breaths of purest hellfire they law low their quarry, slicing and melting flesh from bone.
description: A Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster is a single model armed with Hellfire Breath, a Bloodflail and a Mighty Axe of Khorne.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This model can fly.

abilities.name: Hellfire Breath
abilities.flavorText: Spewing flame from its maw, the daemon incinerates nearby foes, leaving only charred skeletons behind.
abilities.description: Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with Hellfire Breath. Instead, pick an enemy unit that is in range of the attack and roll a dice. On a 2+ that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Relentless Hunter
abilities.flavorText: Those unfortunate enough to have earned Khorne’s ire tend to be renowned champions of their people – the daemon sent to exact the Lord of Battle’s vengeance is well accustomed to slaying their kind.
abilities.description: You can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by this model that target a HERO or MONSTER.

abilities.name: Rune-crown of Khorne
abilities.flavorText: Gifted only to the most exalted denizens of the Blood God’s realm, runecrowns emanate a potent anti-magical aura.
abilities.description: This model can attempt to unbind one spell in the enemy hero phase as if it were a WIZARD. In addition, add 2 to unbinding rolls for this model. In addition, this model can attempt to dispel one endless spell at the start of your hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD.

abilities.name: Lord of the Blood Hunt
abilities.flavorText: Like the sounding of a great brazen horn, this Bloodthirster’s furious roar launches a murderous blood hunt.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly KHORNE DAEMON unit wholly within 16" of a friendly model with this command ability. Until the end of the phase you can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by that unit.

name: Exalted Greater Daemon of Khorne
flavorText: Exalted Greater Daemons of Khorne are the largest and most furious of the Blood God’s servants. Armed with weapons shaped in the fires of their patron’s forges, they butcher their way through rank after rank of enemies, leaving great rivers of gore in their wake.
description: An Exalted Greater Daemon of Khorne is armed with a Lash of Khorne and Mighty Axe of Khorne.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This model can fly.

abilities.name: Drawn in for the Kill
abilities.flavorText: Bloodthirsters often use their barbed lashes to entangle their opponents, rendering escape impossible.
abilities.description: At the start of the enemy movement phase, pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of this model. That unit cannot retreat in that phase.

abilities.name: The Land Rebels
abilities.flavorText: The ground around an Exalted Greater Daemon of Khorne becomes cracked and broken beneath its stomping hooves, causing molten rock to bubble up from deep below.
abilities.description: At the start of your hero phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 8" of any friendly models with this ability. On a 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Rejoice in Exalted Slaughter
abilities.flavorText: An Exalted Greater Daemon of Khorne is an unsubtle leader, driving its subjects towards the enemy in great numbers.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. The command must be issued by this model and received by a friendly KHORNE DAEMON unit. In that combat phase, the unit that receives the command is eligible to fight if it is within 6" of an enemy unit instead of 3", and models from that unit can move an extra 3" when they pile in.

name: Exalted Greater Daemon of Nurgle
flavorText: Riddled with pestilence and disease, an Exalted Greater Daemon of Nurgle is a foul manifestation of Nurgle’s will. With each lumbering step and burbled word, it spreads more of its diseased blessings to those who stand before it.
description: An Exalted Greater Daemon of Nurgle is armed with a Massive Bilesword and Noxious Bile.

characteristics.name: WIZARD
characteristics.description: This model can attempt to cast 2 spells in your hero phase, and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase.

abilities.name: Blubber and Bile
abilities.flavorText: The dubious reward for piercing the blubbery hide of an Exalted Greater Daemon of Nurgle is to be showered by acidic bile and putrid toxins.
abilities.description: This model has a ward of 5+. If an unmodified ward roll for this model is 6 and the attacking unit is within 3" of this model, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.

abilities.name: Corpulent Mass
abilities.flavorText: An Exalted Greater Daemon of Nurgle is blessed with the Plaguefather’s gift of fecundity, enabling its body to swiftly regrow damaged flesh and tissue.
abilities.description: In your hero phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.

abilities.name: Mountain of Loathsome Flesh
abilities.flavorText: Such is the size and girth of an Exalted Greater Daemon of Nurgle that it can simply run over its foes, crushing or asphyxiating them beneath its monstrous bulk as it does so.
abilities.description: Roll 1 dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this model after this model finishes a charge move. On a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Plague Wind
abilities.flavorText: The Exalted Greater Daemon of Nurgle summons a whirlwind of maggots and filth, basking in its feculence for a moment before sending it forth.
abilities.description: Plague Wind is a spell that has a casting value of 7 and a range of 14". If successfully cast, pick 1 point on the battlefield within range and visible to the caster and draw a straight line between that point and the closest point on the caster’s base. Each unit passed across by that line suffers D3 mortal wounds. If that line passes across a NURGLE unit, that unit’s commanding player can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to it instead.

abilities.name: Grandfather’s Exalted Joy
abilities.flavorText: At the Great Unclean One’s command, Nurgle’s children are inspired to fight with even greater exuberance.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability in the combat phase. The command must be issued by this model and received by a friendly NURGLE DAEMON unit. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s melee weapons until the end of that phase.

name: Exalted Greater Daemon of Tzeentch
flavorText: With a wave of its talons, an Exalted Greater Daemon of Tzeentch can hurl its foes into the nightmarish Realm of Chaos or bathe them in deadly magical fires. They are the most malefic servants of the God of Sorcery, and their very forms flicker with arcane energies.
description: An Exalted Greater Daemon of Tzeentch is armed with a Curved Beak and Wicked Talons, and a Staff of Tzeentch.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This model can fly.

characteristics.name: WIZARD
characteristics.description: This model can attempt to cast 2 spells in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 2 spells in the enemy hero phase.

abilities.name: Mastery of Magic
abilities.flavorText: Tzeentch’s daemons are manifestations of magic in its rawest form; the mightiest of their kind can wield sorcerous power with the same ease that a mortal breathes air.
abilities.description: When you make a casting, dispelling or unbinding roll for this model, you can change the lowest dice roll to equal the highest dice roll.

abilities.name: Spell-Thief
abilities.flavorText: Exalted Greater Daemons of Tzeentch have an insatiable appetite for sorcerous knowledge, and by feeding upon arcane manifestations they are able to instantly perfect new forms of spellcraft.
abilities.description: If this model successfully unbinds a spell and the unbinding roll was 9+, this model knows the spell that was unbound.

abilities.name: Infernal Gateway
abilities.flavorText: Tendrils of magic shoot forth to rend the fabric of reality, opening a screaming portal into Tzeentch’s crystal labyrinth.
abilities.description: Infernal Gateway is a spell that has a casting value of 7 and a range of 18". If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster, and roll 9 dice. For each roll that equals or beats the value shown for Infernal Gateway on the damage table above, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Beacon of Sorcery
abilities.flavorText: Spreading its arms wide, the Exalted Greater Daemon of Tzeentch saturates the area with magic.
abilities.description: Add 1 to casting and unbinding rolls for friendly TZEENTCH DAEMON WIZARDS that are wholly within 12" of this model.

name: Soulfeaster Keeper of Secrets
flavorText: Soulfeaster Keepers of Secrets are sensation addicts, devoted above all to the pursuit of new experiences. They roam the battlefield at their own ecstatic whim, using their stabbing tendrils to gorge themselves on the emotions of their victims.
description: A Soulfeaster Keeper of Secrets is armed with an Elegant Greatblade, Impaling Claws and a Sinistrous Hand.

characteristics.name: WIZARD
characteristics.description: This model can attempt to cast 2 spells in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 2 spells in the enemy hero phase.

abilities.name: Dark Temptations
abilities.flavorText: Few can resist the temptations whispered by a Keeper of Secrets.
abilities.description: At the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy HERO within 3" of this model and ask your opponent if they wish for that HERO to accept temptation. If they refuse, that HERO suffers D3 mortal wounds. If they accept, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that HERO. Then, at the start of the next combat phase, roll a dice. On 1-3, that HERO no longer receives this modifier to their hit rolls. On 4-6, that HERO is slain.

abilities.name: Delicate Precision
abilities.flavorText: A Keeper of Secrets attacks their foes with a dazzling array of exquisitely measured blows.
abilities.description: If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by this model is 6, that attack causes a number of mortal wounds to the target equal to the Damage characteristic of the weapon used for the attack and the attack sequence ends (do not make a save roll).

abilities.name: Sinistrous Hand
abilities.flavorText: Reaching out with their longnailed fingers, the Keeper of Secrets rips the heart from their dying victim’s chest and consumes the still-beating organ.
abilities.description: At the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that combat phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model. If any enemy HEROES were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that combat phase, you can heal up to D6 wounds allocated to this model instead.

abilities.name: Soulfeaster Tendrils
abilities.flavorText: The cruel tendrils that snake from the rear of a Soulfeaster Keeper of Secrets’ head are the means through which it feeds on sensation, stabbing into the mind of a chosen adversary and drinking deep their agony and desire.
abilities.description: At the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy HERO within 3" of this model and roll 3D6. If the roll is greater than that model’s Bravery characteristic, you gain D3 depravity points and 1 is subtracted from hit rolls for attacks made by that HERO until the end of that phase.

abilities.name: Cacophonic Choir
abilities.flavorText: The Keeper of Secrets unleashes a sanity‑shattering chorus of magical sound.
abilities.description: Cacophonic Choir is a spell that has a casting value of 6 and a range of 6". If successfully cast, roll 2D6. Each enemy unit within range that has a Bravery characteristic less than the roll suffers D3 mortal wounds.

name: Bladebringer Herald on Exalted Chariot
flavorText: Some Heralds of Slaanesh become so intoxicated by the act of riding flesh-shredding chariots into the enemy that they commission ever larger and grander conveyances, the better to harvest the souls of mortals.
description: A Bladebringer, Herald on Exalted Chariot is a single model armed with Flensing Whips.

characteristics.name: CREW AND STEEDS
characteristics.description: An Exalted Chariot has a Daemonette crew armed with Piercing Claws, and is drawn by Steeds of Slaanesh that attack with their Poisoned Tongues. For rules purposes, the Daemonettes and Steeds of Slaanesh are treated in the same manner as a mount.

abilities.name: Excess of Blades
abilities.flavorText: An Exalted Chariot inflicts horrendous carnage when it ploughs into the foe.
abilities.description: After this model finishes a charge move, roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of it. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2-4, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 5+, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Pungent Soulscent
abilities.flavorText: The whirling blades of this fearsome chariot mow down the enemy, transmuting their souls into an exhilarating incense that drives its riders into an ecstatic frenzy.
abilities.description: At the start of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this model. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, for each 2+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s melee weapons until the end of that phase.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldAcquiescence
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Acquiescence spells.

abilities.name: Acquiescence
abilities.flavorText: The Herald engulfs the foe in an arcane haze of dreams and unattainable desires.
abilities.description: Acquiescence has a casting value of 5. If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.

name: Bladebringer Herald on Hellflayer
flavorText: Slaaneshi Heralds who wish to glut themselves on as much sensation as possible ride to war on Hellflayer chariots, great threshing contraptions that release an intoxicating soulscent distilled from the souls of those sliced apart by their axle blades.
description: A Bladebringer, Herald on Hellflayer is a single model armed with Ravaging Claws.

characteristics.name: CREW AND STEEDS
characteristics.description: A Hellflayer has a Daemonette crew armed with Piercing Claws and Flensing Whips, and is drawn by Steeds of Slaanesh that attack with their Poisoned Tongues. For rules purposes, the Daemonettes and Steeds of Slaanesh are treated in the same manner as a mount.

abilities.name: Soulscent
abilities.flavorText: The whirling blades of this fearsome chariot mow down the enemy, transmuting their souls into an exhilarating incense that drives its riders into an ecstatic frenzy.
abilities.description: At the start of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this model. On a 4+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, for each 4+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s melee weapons until the end of that phase.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldAcquiescence
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Acquiescence spells.

abilities.name: Acquiescence
abilities.flavorText: The Herald engulfs the foe in an arcane haze of dreams and unattainable desires.
abilities.description: Acquiescence has a casting value of 5. If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.

name: Bladebringer Herald on Seeker Chariot
flavorText: Heralds of Slaanesh that value the thrill of speed above all else will take to battle mounted on a Seeker Chariot. These bladed machineries of war smash into the foe in a blur of whirring, slashing blades, mutilating all those who stand their ground.
description: A Bladebringer, Herald on Seeker Chariot is a single model armed with Flensing Whips.

characteristics.name: CREW AND STEEDS
characteristics.description: A Seeker Chariot has a Daemonette crew armed with Piercing Claws, and is drawn by Steeds of Slaanesh that attack with their Poisoned Tongues. For rules purposes, the Daemonette and Steeds of Slaanesh are treated in the same manner as a mount.

abilities.name: Impossibly Swift
abilities.flavorText: Seeker Chariots surge across the battlefield with unnatural swiftness.
abilities.description: This model can retreat and still charge later in the same turn.

abilities.name: Mutilating Blades
abilities.flavorText: A Seeker Chariot inflicts carnage when it ploughs into the foe.
abilities.description: After this model finishes a charge move, roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of it. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldAcquiescence
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Acquiescence spells.

abilities.name: Acquiescence
abilities.flavorText: The Herald engulfs the foe in an arcane haze of dreams and unattainable desires.
abilities.description: Acquiescence has a casting value of 5. If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.

name: Bloodmaster Herald of Khorne
flavorText: Each swing of the Bloodmaster’s blade opens throats and splits torsos, while truly worthy victims find their heads severed from their bodies. Around the Herald, the Bloodletters of Khorne fight all the harder, driven to a frenzy by his murderous aura.
description: A Bloodmaster, Herald of Khorne is a single model armed with a Blade of Blood.

abilities.name: Decapitating Blow
abilities.flavorText: There are few weapons so feared as the hellforged blades of the Bloodletters.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Blade of Blood is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.

abilities.name: The Blood Must Flow
abilities.flavorText: Rallied by this Herald’s bloody example, Khorne’s lesser daemons leap into combat.
abilities.description: In the combat phase, after this unit has fought in that combat phase for the first time, you can pick 1 friendly BLOODLETTER unit that is wholly within 12" of this model and is within 3" of an enemy unit, and which has not yet fought in that combat phase. The unit you pick must fight immediately, instead of being picked to fight later in that combat phase.

name: Changecaster Herald of Tzeentch
flavorText: Wielding the pink changefire of its patron, a Herald of Tzeentch is a luminescent servant of the Changer of the Ways. Any that attempt to thwart its anarchic cause will soon feel the wrath of living flames or the mutating blows of its Staff of Change.
description: A Changecaster, Herald of Tzeentch, is a single model armed with Magical Flames and one of the following weapon options: Staff of Change and Arcane Tome; or Ritual Dagger and Arcane Tome.

abilities.name: Fortune and Fate
abilities.flavorText: The sacred number nine blesses any follower practising the arcane.
abilities.description: If this model successfully casts a spell with a casting roll of 9+, this model can attempt to cast 1 extra spell in that phase.

abilities.name: Arcane Tome
abilities.flavorText: This arcane tome holds scriptures of ancient incantation that allows a brief mastery of the Herald’s chosen spell lores.
abilities.description: Once per battle, when this model attempts to cast or unbind a spell, you can roll 3D6, remove 1 dice of your choice, and then use the remaining 2D6 to determine the casting or unbinding roll.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldPink Fire of Tzeentch
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Pink Fire of Tzeentch spells.

abilities.name: Pink Fire of Tzeentch
abilities.flavorText: The Changecaster conjures a tide of writhing warpflame that engulfs the foe.
abilities.description: Pink Fire of Tzeentch has a casting value of 9. If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them. That unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

name: Chaos Lord on Daemonic Mount
flavorText: Particularly favoured Chaos Lords may be granted a daemonic steed to bear them into battle. These champions become the rulers of feared cavalry warbands, driving their mounted brethren into battle with roared oaths to the Dark Gods.
description: A Chaos Lord on Daemonic Mount is a single model armed with a Cursed Warhammer and Chaos Runeshield.

characteristics.name: MOUNT
characteristics.description: This model’s Daemonic Mount attacks with its Mighty Hooves.

characteristics.name: MARK OF CHAOS
characteristics.description: When you select this model to be part of your army, you must give it one of the following Mark of Chaos keywords: KHORNE, TZEENTCH, NURGLE, SLAANESH or UNDIVIDED.

abilities.name: Chaos Runeshield
abilities.flavorText: The dark runes inscribed upon these shields grant them the power to withstand even the most powerful attacks.
abilities.description: Roll a dice each time you allocate a mortal wound to this model. On a 5+, that mortal wound is negated.

abilities.name: Cursed Warhammer
abilities.flavorText: Those struck by this malevolent weapon are soon blasted apart in an explosion of unholy power.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Cursed Warhammer is 6, that attack inflicts 2 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).

abilities.name: Fuelled by Carnage
abilities.flavorText: Those Chaos Lords who rise high in the favour of the gods find themselves sustained by the act of killing alone.
abilities.description: At the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s Cursed Warhammer in that phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.

abilities.name: The Knights of Chaos
abilities.flavorText: This Chaos Lord commands his mounted brethren to seek and destroy the foe with renewed hatred.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly CHAOS KNIGHTS, CHAOS CHARIOTS or GOREBEAST CHARIOTS unit wholly within 18" of a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS HERO with this command ability. You can re-roll charge rolls for that unit and add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that unit until your next hero phase. The same unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per turn.

name: Epidemius Tallyman of Nurgle
flavorText: Sat upon his mouldering palanquin, borne aloft by a mound of Nurglings, Epidemius gazes across the battlefield with jaded contempt. As his endless tally of Nurgle’s diseases rises, so do the Plague God’s minions become empowered.

name: Fateskimmer Herald of Tzeentch on Burning Chariot
flavorText: Trailing flames and maniacal laughter, a Fateskimmer streaks across the skies. While the Herald conjures firestorms to engulf the foe, the living chariot it rides seeks to sear all those in its path, the Screamers at its fore biting their prey as they speed by.
description: A Fateskimmer, Herald of Tzeentch on Burning Chariot, is a single model armed with Magical Flames, Staff of Change and Ritual Dagger.

characteristics.name: MOUNT
characteristics.description: This model’s Screamers of Tzeentch attack with their Lamprey Bites.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This model can fly.

abilities.name: Arcane Tome
abilities.flavorText: This arcane tome holds scriptures of ancient incantation that allows a brief mastery of the Herald’s chosen spell lores.
abilities.description: Once per battle, when this model attempts to cast or unbind a spell, you can roll 3D6, remove 1 dice of your choice, and then use the remaining 2D6 to determine the casting or unbinding roll.

abilities.name: Sky-sharks
abilities.flavorText: Screamers that manage to sink their teeth into a larger creature will not let go easily, eventually tearing off huge chunks of bloodied flesh.
abilities.description: If the target is an enemy MONSTER, change the Damage characteristic of this model’s Lamprey Bite to D3.

abilities.name: Wake of Fire
abilities.flavorText: Enemies unfortunate enough to be passed by a Burning Chariot are consumed by waves of unnatural fire.
abilities.description: After this model has made a normal move, you can pick 1 enemy unit that has any models passed across by this model and roll a dice. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldTzeentch’s Firestorm
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Tzeentch’s Firestorm spells.

abilities.name: Tzeentch’s Firestorm
abilities.flavorText: Searing balls of scarlet flame whip around the caster before spiralling outwards to engulf nearby enemies.
abilities.description: Tzeentch’s Firestorm has a casting value of 8. If successfully cast, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 9" of the caster and visible to them. On a 3+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

name: Fluxmaster Herald of Tzeentch on Disc
flavorText: There is nowhere on the battlefield safe from a Herald riding a Disc of Tzeentch. Bolting through the air, the Fluxmaster conjures blue flames to hurl at the foe before darting in to deliver a swift blow from a mutative Staff of Change.
description: A Fluxmaster, Herald of Tzeentch on Disc, is a single model armed with Magical Flames and one of the following weapon options: Staff of Change and Arcane Tome; or Ritual Dagger and Arcane Tome.

characteristics.name: MOUNT
characteristics.description: This model’s Disc of Tzeentch attacks with its Teeth and Horns.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This model can fly.

abilities.name: Arcane Tome
abilities.flavorText: This arcane tome holds scriptures of ancient incantation that allows a brief mastery of the herald’s chosen spell lores.
abilities.description: Once per battle, when this model attempts to cast or unbind a spell, you can roll 3D6, remove 1 dice of your choice, and then use the remaining 2D6 to determine the casting or unbinding roll.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldBlue Fire of Tzeentch
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Blue Fire of Tzeentch spells.

abilities.name: Blue Fire of Tzeentch
abilities.flavorText: A tide of iridescent mutating flame surges forth from the Fluxmaster as it cackles from its swooping Disc.
abilities.description: Blue Fire of Tzeentch has a casting value of 5. If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them, and roll 9 dice. For each 6, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

name: Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne
flavorText: The Blood Throne roars into battle with its monstrous maw gaping wide, hungry for mortal flesh. Atop its dais, the Rendmaster bellows commands to his foot soldiers as he and his charioteers cut down any foes foolish enough to approach.
description: A Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne is a single model armed with a Blade of Blood.

characteristics.name: MOUNT
characteristics.description: This model’s Blood Throne attacks with its Gnashing Maw.

characteristics.name: CREW
characteristics.description: This model has a Bloodletter crew that attack with their Hellblades. For rules purposes, the crew are treated in the same manner as a mount.

abilities.name: Gorefeast
abilities.flavorText: The Blood Throne’s dark vitality increases with each mouthful of enemy flesh and bone.
abilities.description: If any wounds are inflicted by this model’s Gnashing Maw and not negated, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.

abilities.name: Decapitating Blow
abilities.flavorText: There are few weapons so feared as the hellforged blades of the Bloodletters.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Blade of Blood or Hellblades is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.

name: Horticulous Slimux
flavorText: As Nurgle’s head horticulturist, Slimux has the power to seed his master’s Garden in reality. Surrounded by packs of Beasts of Nurgle and wielding his lethal lopping shears, he is a being to be rightly feared.

name: Infernal Enrapturess Herald of Slaanesh
flavorText: Maestros of discordance, Infernal Enrapturesses fill the battlefield with screams of pain and unrestrained elation. They are virtuosos among Slaanesh’s infernal choir, towards whom the Dark Prince’s daemonic legions are drawn.
description: An Infernal Enrapturess, Herald of Slaanesh is a single model armed with a Heartstring Lyre and Ravaging Claw.

abilities.name: Discordant Disruption
abilities.flavorText: An Infernal Enrapturess can play discordant music that is so intense it causes physical harm to those that are attuned to magic.
abilities.description: Re-roll successful casting rolls for enemy WIZARDS that are within 24" of any friendly models with this ability. In addition, if the re-rolled casting roll is a double, that WIZARD suffers D3 mortal wounds after the effects of the spell (if any) have been resolved.In addition, this model can attempt to dispel 1 endless spell at the start of your hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD. If it does so, add 1 to the dispelling roll.

abilities.name: Versatile Instrument
abilities.flavorText: An Infernal Enrapturess can quickly switch between playing a swift medley of short notes or a single massive blast of sound.
abilities.description: Before attacking with a heartstring lyre, choose either the Cacophonous Melody or Euphonic Blast missile weapon characteristics for that shooting attack.

name: Poxbringer Herald of Nurgle
flavorText: Poxbringers serve as the festering right hands of the Great Unclean Ones. They lead the tallybands into the thick of battle, wielding gangrenous magics and befouled blades to strike down their enemies.

name: Skullmaster Herald of Khorne
flavorText: The war cry of the Skullmaster rings out over the thunderous hoof-beats of its ironclad steed moments before it slams into the foe with titanic force. Armour buckles, flesh tears, bones shatter and blood falls like rain as the Herald exults in the carnage.
description: A Skullmaster, Herald of Khorne is a single model armed with a Blade of Blood.

characteristics.name: MOUNT
characteristics.description: This model’s Juggernaut attacks with its Brazen Hooves.

abilities.name: Slaughter and Ruin
abilities.flavorText: Skullmasters descend upon the enemy with the wrath of the Blood God himself.
abilities.description: You can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by this model if it made a charge move in the same turn.

abilities.name: Decapitating Blow
abilities.flavorText: There are few weapons so feared as the hellforged blades of the Bloodletters.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Blade of Blood is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.

abilities.name: Slaughterous Charge
abilities.flavorText: The crushing mass and stamping hooves of Khorne’s Juggernauts are a threat to all in their path.
abilities.description: After this model makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of it and roll a dice. On a 2+ that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

name: Skulltaker
flavorText: Skulltaker is Khorne’s immortal champion and the greatest of all Bloodletters. Ever seeking worthy skulls for his master, he scans the battlefield for the enemy’s greatest champion, bellowing his challenge before moving in to end yet another storied life.
description: Skulltaker is a named character that is a single model. He is armed with the Slayer Sword.

abilities.name: Cloak of Skulls
abilities.flavorText: Many a would-be death blow has ricocheted harmlessly off Skulltaker’s grisly pelt of trophies.
abilities.description: Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Decapitating Strike
abilities.flavorText: There are few weapons so feared as the hellforged blades of the Bloodletters.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with the Slayer Sword is 6, that attack inflicts 3 mortal wounds on the target in addition to any normal damage.

abilities.name: Heroes’ Bane
abilities.flavorText: When faced with a worthy opponent, Skulltaker unleashes his full martial might.
abilities.description: You can re-roll hit and wound rolls for attacks made by this model that target a HERO.

abilities.name: Heads Must Roll
abilities.flavorText: Skulltaker is the greatest of all Bloodletters, and his mastery of death-dealing sets a grisly example for all of his kind to follow.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly BLOODLETTERS unit wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability. Until the end of that phase, you can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for attacks made by that unit.

name: Slaves to Darkness Daemon Prince
flavorText: Those champions who consistently please their patron god may eventually be granted immortality as a Daemon Prince. Each of these black-hearted monsters is a living icon of their master’s power, and a terrifying foe to face on the battlefield.
description: A Slaves to Darkness Daemon Prince is a single model armed with one of the following weapon options: Daemonic Axe and Malefic Talons; or Hellforged Sword and Malefic Talons.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This model can fly.

characteristics.name: MARK OF CHAOS
characteristics.description: When you select this model to be part of your army, you must give it one of the following Mark of Chaos keywords: KHORNE, TZEENTCH, NURGLE or SLAANESH.

abilities.name: Bounding Charge
abilities.flavorText: Little can hope to stand before the fury of a charging Daemon Prince.
abilities.description: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this model if it charged in the same turn.

abilities.name: Hellforged Sword
abilities.flavorText: This sword can carve through armour and flesh as if they were made of nothing more than paper.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Hellforged Sword is 6, that attack inflicts 2 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).

abilities.name: Immortal Champion
abilities.flavorText: Those favoured enough to ascend to daemonhood are among the most deadly servants of the Ruinous Powers.
abilities.description: This model fights at the start of the combat phase. This model cannot fight again in that phase unless an ability or spell allows it to fight more than once.

abilities.name: Bloodslick Ground
abilities.flavorText: The Daemon Prince summons pools of thick gore around itself to hinder the movement of its enemies.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability in your hero phase if this model has the KHORNE keyword. If you do so, until your next hero phase, run and charge rolls made for enemy units within 18" of this model are halved. You cannot use this command ability more than once per turn.

abilities.name: Arcane Influence
abilities.flavorText: The Daemon Prince harnesses a fraction of Tzeentch’s arcane might.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability at the start of your hero phase if this model has the TZEENTCH keyword. If you do so, pick 1 friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS WIZARD wholly within 12" of this model. Add 1 to casting rolls for that unit until the end of that phase.

abilities.name: Bloated Blessings
abilities.flavorText: The Daemon Prince gifts their followers with pestilent pustules that spray bile and corrosive acid when burst open.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability at the start of your hero phase if this model has the NURGLE keyword. If you do so, pick 1 friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS NURGLE unit wholly within 12" of this model. Until your next hero phase, each time that unit is picked as the target for any attacks made with melee weapons, if the unmodified hit roll for any of those attacks is 6, the attacking unit suffers D3 mortal wounds after all of its attacks have been resolved. The same unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per phase.

abilities.name: Revel in Agony
abilities.flavorText: The deadly mania of this Daemon Prince and their followers only grows as they suffer blissful injury.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase if this model has the SLAANESH keyword. If you do so, until your next hero phase, if any models from a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS SLAANESH unit wholly within 12" of this model are slain by an attack made with a melee weapon by an enemy unit, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that friendly unit that target that enemy unit until your next hero phase. You cannot use this command ability more than once per turn.

name: Sloppity Bilepiper Herald of Nurgle
flavorText: Sloppity Bilepipers caper through the ranks of Nurgle’s legions as they advance. Infected with a plague of mirth, they prance and quip, entertaining their fellow daemons even as they cause the enemy to literally die laughing.

name: Spoilpox Scrivener Herald of Nurgle
flavorText: Spoilpox Scriveners keep a strict watch over the tallying of the Plaguebearers. Should an enemy stray too close, they bite off heads and limbs with their trunklike maws, or blanket them in foul mucus with almighty sneezes.

name: The Blue Scribes
flavorText: Tzeentch created two daemons, P’tarix and Xirat’p, for the sole purpose of learning every spell in existence. The Blue Scribes, as they are known, ride their Disc of Tzeentch through the realms seeking every fragment of arcana.
description: The Blue Scribes is a named character that is a single model. It is armed with Sharpened Quills.

characteristics.name: MOUNT
characteristics.description: This model’s Disc of Tzeentch attacks with its Teeth and Horns.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This model can fly.

abilities.name: Frantic Scribbling
abilities.flavorText: The Blue Scribes seek any unknown incantations that might be used against them.
abilities.description: Each time a WIZARD wholly within 18" of this model successfully casts a spell that is not unbound and that is possible for this model to cast, you can roll a dice. On a 4+, this model knows that spell for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Scrolls of Sorcery
abilities.flavorText: The unlimited arcane knowledge held on these scrolls can conjure sorceries of perfect structure.
abilities.description: Once in each of your hero phases, when this model attempts to cast a spell, instead of making a casting roll, you can say that it will read from its scrolls of sorcery. If you do so, roll a dice. On a 2+, that spell is automatically cast and cannot be unbound.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldBoon of Tzeentch
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Boon of Tzeentch spells.

abilities.name: Boon of Tzeentch
abilities.flavorText: The Blue Scribes reach forth, tapping into an unseen hoard of arcane power.
abilities.description: Boon of Tzeentch has a casting value of 4. If successfully cast, you can re-roll casting rolls for friendly TZEENTCH WIZARDS wholly within 18" of the caster for the rest of that phase.

name: The Changeling
flavorText: A master of illusionary disguise, the Changeling hides amongst its quarry, sowing confusion amongst their ranks. Upon throwing aside its fleshly masquerade, the Changeling uses sorcery and its Trickster’s Staff to openly blast its foes.
description: The Changeling is a named character that is a single model. It is armed with the Trickster’s Staff.

abilities.name: Puckish Misdirection
abilities.flavorText: The Changeling can manipulate the most stalwart of warriors while appearing as a trusted advisor or comrade.
abilities.description: In the enemy hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 9" of this model. If you do so, until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit and half the Move characteristic of that unit (rounding up).

abilities.name: Arch-deceiver
abilities.flavorText: None can detect the veil of the Changeling. Assuming the form of comrade and ally, it reveals itself only when its plans have been made a reality.
abilities.description: At the start of the first battle round, after armies have been set up but before the first turn begins, you can remove this model from the battlefield. If you do so, at the end of your first movement phase, you must set this model up again anywhere within your opponent’s territory more than 3" from any enemy units.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic Shield
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 2 spells in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 2 spells in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt and Mystic Shield spells.In addition, while this model is within 9" of an enemy WIZARD, it knows any spells on that WIZARD’s warscroll that are possible for this model to cast.

name: The Contorted Epitome
flavorText: The Contorted Epitome writhes across the battlefield on lashing metallic tentacles, twisting under the control of its Daemonette attendants to reflect its enemy’s darkest desires and deepest fears.
description: The Contorted Epitome is a single model. It is armed with Ravaging Claws and Coiled Tentacles.

abilities.name: Gift of Power
abilities.flavorText: The Heralds that guard a Contorted Epitome can use its power to enhance their own spells.
abilities.description: You can re-roll casting rolls for this model.

abilities.name: Swallow Energy
abilities.flavorText: A Contorted Epitome steals the most intense and excessive energies, channelling them back to Slaanesh’s Temple of Twisted Mirrors.
abilities.description: Roll a dice each time you allocate a mortal wound to this model. On a 2+, that mortal wound is negated.

abilities.name: Horrible Fascination
abilities.flavorText: When a warrior stares into the Contorted Epitome’s mirror, they see all of their hopes and fears reflected there, and cannot tear their eyes away.
abilities.description: At the start of the combat phase, you can roll 1 dice for each enemy unit within 3" of this model. On a 4+, this model cannot be picked as the target of attacks made by that unit in that phase until this model makes any attacks in that phase.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldOverwhelming Acquiescence
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 2 spells in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 2 spells in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Overwhelming Acquiescence spells.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Acquiescence
abilities.flavorText: The Herald engulfs the foe in an arcane haze of dreams and unattainable desires.
abilities.description: Overwhelming Acquiescence has a casting value of 7. If successfully cast, pick up to D3 enemy units within 24" of the caster that are visible to them. You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks that target those units until your next hero phase.

name: The Masque
flavorText: The Masque once entertained Slaanesh, but then displeased him, and was exiled. Since then, the Herald has been cursed to dance across the Mortal Realms. Those drawn into this endless performance are doomed to a swift and spectacular death.
description: The Masque is a named character that is single model. They are armed with Ravaging Claws.

abilities.name: Staff of Masks
abilities.flavorText: The masks on this staff constantly flicker and change, enhancing the Masque’s attacks or protecting them from harm.
abilities.description: At the start of your hero phase, you can either add D3 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s melee weapons until your next hero phase or heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.

abilities.name: The Endless Dance
abilities.flavorText: The Masque dances eternally, flying through the air and striking down the foes that stumble, flat-footed, in their wake.
abilities.description: This model is eligible to fight in the combat phase if it is within 6" of an enemy unit instead of 3", and can fly and move an extra 3" when it piles in.In addition, you can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by this model that target an enemy unit with a Move characteristic of 10" or less, and you can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made by this model that target an enemy unit with a Move characteristic of 5" or less.

abilities.name: Lithe and Swift
abilities.flavorText: Daemonettes surge across the battlefield with impossible swiftness.
abilities.description: This model can run and still charge later in the same turn.

abilities.name: Inhuman Reflexes
abilities.flavorText: The Masque is a constant blur of motion, stepping out of the way of the enemy’s attacks with uncanny precision.
abilities.description: Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model. On a 4+, that wound or mortal wound is negated.

name: Viceleader Herald of Slaanesh
flavorText: The Viceleader is a masterful artiste in the grand theatre of war. To look upon these surreal, quicksilver Heralds is to feel a yearning for forbidden arts and excesses that addles the mind. Woe to those who acquiesce to their strange allure.
description: A Viceleader, Herald of Slaanesh is a single model armed with Ravaging Claws.

abilities.name: Lightning Reflexes
abilities.flavorText: Heralds of Slaanesh move with lightning speed, stepping out of the way of the enemy’s attacks with disdainful ease.
abilities.description: Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model. On a 5+, that wound or mortal wound is negated.

abilities.name: Lithe and Swift
abilities.flavorText: Daemonettes surge across the battlefield with impossible swiftness.
abilities.description: This model can run and still charge later in the same turn.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldAcquiescence
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Acquiescence spells.

abilities.name: Acquiescence
abilities.flavorText: The Herald engulfs the foe in an arcane haze of dreams and unattainable desires.
abilities.description: Acquiescence has a casting value of 5. If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.

name: Dexcessa the Talon of Slaanesh
flavorText: Dexcessa considers themselves to be the right hand of Slaanesh, made manifest in the realms to sunder and unpick the alliances of his enemies. If that means that they can revel in the glorious, ever-escalating excess of battle, so much the better.
description: Dexcessa, the Talon of Slaanesh, is a named character that is a single model. They are armed with a Scourge of Slaanesh and Impaling Talons.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This model can fly.

abilities.name: Fleeting Dance of Death
abilities.flavorText: Dexcessa rarely stays locked in combat in one place for long, flitting swiftly all over the battlefield and bringing death where they alight.
abilities.description: This model can run or retreat and still charge later in the same turn.

abilities.name: Joyous Battle Fury
abilities.flavorText: Once Dexcessa begins to fight, they become invigorated by the glorious thrill of combat.
abilities.description: After this model has fought for the first time, at the start of each battle round, add 1 to the Attacks characteristics of this model’s weapons for the rest of the battle. This effect is cumulative.

abilities.name: Mesmerising Lepidoptera
abilities.flavorText: Dexcessa’s multifaceted wings create a hypnotic effect that distracts their foes.
abilities.description: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this model.

abilities.name: Sceptre of Slaanesh
abilities.flavorText: The sceptre of Slaanesh allows the bearer to demand total, unthinking obedience from Slaanesh’s daemonic minions.
abilities.description: Do not take battleshock tests for friendly SLAANESH DAEMON units wholly within 12" of this model.In addition, once per turn, this model can issue a command to a friendly SLAANESH DAEMON unit without a command point being spent.

name: Synessa the Voice of Slaanesh
flavorText: Where their sibling adores physical excess, Synessa’s power lies in the manipulation of the mind. Even a glance at their splendour leaves those nearby enthralled, and the daemons of Slaanesh enter raptures of obedience at their every word.
description: Synessa, the Voice of Slaanesh, is a named character that is a single model. They are armed with the Staff of Slaanesh and Impaling Talons.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This model can fly.

abilities.name: Mesmerising Lepidoptera
abilities.flavorText: Synessa’s multifaceted wings create a hypnotic effect that distracts their foes.
abilities.description: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this model.

abilities.name: Staff of Slaanesh
abilities.flavorText: Those who are struck by the bolts of energy unleashed by this staff find themselves tearing at their own flesh in an ecstasy of self-mutilation.
abilities.description: Do not pick a target or use the attack sequence for an attack made with this model’s Staff of Slaanesh. Instead, pick 1 enemy unit within range of this model’s Staff of Slaanesh and visible to them. The opposing player must roll a dice for that unit.If the roll is less than that unit’s Save characteristic but not a 6, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. If the roll is equal to or greater than that unit’s Save characteristic but not a 6, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 6, nothing happens.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldWhispers of Doubt
abilities.description: Synessa, the Voice of Slaanesh, is a WIZARD. They can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. They know the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Whispers of Doubt spells. In addition, they know all of the spells from the Lore of Slaanesh, the Forbidden Sorceries of Slaanesh and the Lore of Pain and Pleasure.

abilities.name: Whispers of Doubt
abilities.flavorText: The caster whispers words that reveal the enemy’s darkest desires, breaking their concentration and leaving them vulnerable to attack.
abilities.description: Whispers of Doubt has a casting value of 6. If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy HERO within 3" of the caster and visible to them, and roll 3D6. If the roll is equal to or greater than that HERO’s Bravery characteristic, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks that target that HERO until your next hero phase.

name: Bloodletters
flavorText: Beneath unholy icons and bloodsoaked banners, letting loose roaring battle cries and terrifying blasts from brazen horns, the Bloodletters of Khorne surge forwards in a writhing tide of corded muscle and hellforged swords to maim and slaughter their foes.
description: A unit of Bloodletters has any number of models, each armed with a Hellblade.

characteristics.name: BLOODREAPER
characteristics.description: 1 model in this unit can be a Bloodreaper. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Hellblade.

characteristics.name: STANDARD BEARERS
characteristics.description: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can either be a Bloodsoaked Banner Bearer or Gore-drenched Icon Bearer.Bloodsoaked Banner: You can re-roll charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Bloodsoaked Banner Bearers.Gore-drenched Icon: If an unmodified battleshock roll of 1 is made for this unit while it includes any Gore-drenched Icon Bearers, you can add D6 models to this unit, and no models from this unit will flee in that phase.

characteristics.name: HORNBLOWERS
characteristics.description: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. While this unit includes any Hornblowers, if the unmodified roll for a battleshock test for an enemy unit that is within 8" of this unit is 1, that battleshock test must be re-rolled.

abilities.name: Decapitating Blow
abilities.flavorText: There are few weapons so feared as the hellforged blades of the Bloodletters.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Hellblade is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.

abilities.name: Murderous Tide
abilities.flavorText: Massed Bloodletters will surge forth to rain a thunderstorm of blows upon the foe.
abilities.description: You can add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit while this unit has at least 20 models.

name: Daemonettes
flavorText: Possessed of impossible grace and grotesque beauty, Daemonettes of Slaanesh bound across the battlefield with sadistic glee. They are in constant competition with one another to see who can inflict the most pain on the enemies of the Dark Prince.
description: A unit of Daemonettes has any number of models, each armed with Piercing Claws.

characteristics.name: ALLURER
characteristics.description: 1 model in this unit can be an Allurer. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Piercing Claws.

characteristics.name: STANDARD BEARERS
